changelog.md.Retour de la fonction de decouverte ONVI: Return of the ONVIF discovery function (thank you @Aidom)
changelog.md.Possibilité d'utiliser des commandes (ty: Possibility to use commands (script type) for camera control
changelog.md.Optimisation de la fonction de nettoyage: Optimization of the cleaning function of camera capture files
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la prise de vide: Correction of a bug on the taking of video under debian 10
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur le rtsp en debian: Bug fix on rtsp in debian 10
changelog.md.Ajout d'un champs pour mettre des option: Addition of a field to put options video stream (rtsp)
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug ou la tache cronHour: Fixed a bug where the cronHourly task of the camera plugin could not finish
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la prévisualisat: Correction of a bug on the preview of the capture history
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis si il y a des & d: Correction of a problem if there are & in the url of stream rtsp
changelog.md.Amélioration de la securité sur le flux: Improved security on the video stream
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis si il y a des esp: Fixed a problem if there are spaces in the video stream url
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le panel: Correction of a bug on the panel
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur la configurat: Correction of a problem with the configuration of Wanscam q3 (s)
changelog.md.Selection du mode automatiquement en fon: Mode selection automatically based on capture url and video stream (RTSP)
changelog.md.Ajout du remplacement de #username# et #: Added replacement of # username # and # password # in commands
changelog.md.Refonte du panel, on choisi maintenant l: Redesign of the panel, we now choose the number of cameras per line in the plugin configuration, their size is calculated automatically
changelog.md.Support des flux video RTSP\/MJPEG... At: Support for RTSP / MJPEG video streams ... Please note that there is a conversion done. This is only to be used if you have no choice, you should privilege snapshots (faster and less load on Jeedom)
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option pour désactiver toute: Addition of an option to deactivate any image compression on the Jeedom side

index.md.Plugin permettant de créer et gérer des: Plugin to create and manage wifi cameras (display and recording)
index.md.Après installation du plugin, il vous su: After installing the plugin, you just need to activate it, however there are some advanced configuration parameters
index.md.indique le chemin où Jeedom doit stocker: indicates the path where Jeedom should store the images it captures from your cameras (it is not recommended to touch it).
index.md.Si votre chemin n'est pas dans le chemin: If your path is not in the Jeedom installation path then you will not be able to view the captures in Jeedom.
index.md.indique la taille maximum autorisée pour: indicates the maximum size authorized for the folder where the captures are saved (it is not recommended to touch them).
index.md.Si ce quotas est atteint Jeedom supprime: If this quota is reached Jeedom will delete the oldest catches.
index.md.Le plugin caméra doit réagir aux interac: The camera plugin must react to interactions
index.md.mots clés \/ phrases auxquel(le)s le plu: keywords / phrases to which the plugin will react via Jeedom interactions.
index.md.Vous permet d'afficher le panel (Menu Ac: Allows you to display the panel (Home Menu -> Camera) and to have a view of all of your cameras (see below).
index.md.N'oubliez pas d'activer le panel dans la: Do not forget to activate the panel in the configuration of the plugin to access it later.
index.md.Ici vous avez les informations principal: Here you have the main information of your camera
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.le rend visible sur le dashboard: makes it visible on the dashboard
index.md.l'adresse IP local de votre caméra: the local IP address of your camera
index.md.le port pour sur lequel joindre la camér: the port for which to attach the camera
index.md.le protocole de communication de votre c: the communication protocol of your camera (http or https)
index.md.nom d'utilisateur pour se connecter à la: username to log in to the camera (if necessary).
index.md.Attention le plugin ne supporte pas les: Please note that the plugin does not support special characters (you must therefore limit yourself to numbers, lowercase / uppercase letters)
index.md.mot de passe pour se connecter à la camé: password to connect to the camera (if necessary).
index.md.Attention à ne pas mettre une url de flu: Be careful not to put a flow url under penalty of crashing Jeedom.
index.md.Vous pouvez ajouter les tags \\#username: You can add the tags \ #username \ # and \ #password \ #, which will be automatically replaced by the username and password when using this command
index.md.url du flux video de la caméra de type r: url of the video stream of the camera type rtsp: // # username #: #password # @ # ip #: 554 / videoMain (example for Foscam cameras)
index.md.permet de choisir le modèle de la caméra: allows you to choose the camera model.
index.md.Attention si vous changez cela écrasera: Be careful if you change this will overwrite your configuration settings
index.md.Cette partie vous permet de configurer l: This part allows you to configure the image quality.
index.md.En effet Jeedom diminue la taille de l'i: Indeed Jeedom decreases the size of the image or the compress before sending it to your browser.
index.md.Cela permet de gagner en fluidité des im: This allows the images to be more fluid (because they are lighter).
index.md.C'est aussi dans cette partie que vous p: It is also in this part that you can configure the number of images per second to display.
index.md.Tous les réglages sont déclinés en : mob: All settings are available in: mobile / desktop and miniature / normal.
index.md.Rafraichissement (s) : délai en seconde: Refresh (s): delay in seconds between the display of 2 images (here you can put numbers less than 1)
index.md.Compression (%) : plus il est faible moi: Compression (%): the lower it is the less the image is compressed, at 100% no compression is done
index.md.Taille (% - 0 : automatique) : plus le %: Size (% - 0: automatic): the higher the%, the closer we are to the original size of the image.
index.md.A 100 % aucun redimensionnement de l'ima: At 100% no resizing of the image takes place
index.md.Si vous mettez une compression de 0% et: If you put a compression of 0% and a size of 100%, Jeedom will not touch the image in normal mode.
index.md.Cela n'est pas valable en mode miniature: This is not valid in miniature mode where there is a maximum image size of 360px.
index.md.Durée maximum d'un enregistrement : duré: Maximum duration of a recording: maximum duration of recordings
index.md.Toujours faire une vidéo : force Jeedom: Always make a video: Jeedom forces to always transform the recordings into video before recording
index.md.Nombre d'images par seconde de la vidéo: Number of frames per second of video: number of frames per second of videos
index.md.Seuil de détection mouvement (0-100) : s: Motion detection threshold (0-100): motion detection threshold (it is advisable to set 2).
index.md.Plus la valeur est grande plus la sensib: The higher the value, the more the sensitivity increases.
index.md.Supprimer toutes les captures de la camé: Delete all captures from camera: delete all captures and recordings from camera
index.md.Commande ON : Commande permettant de met: ON command: Command for switching on the power supply to the camera
index.md.Commande OFF : Commande permettant de co: OFF command: Command to cut the power to the camera
index.md.ID de la commande (utiliser avec les com: Order ID (use with info type commands to, for example, bring the movement information from the camera to Jeedom via the API, see below)
index.md.Nom de la commande avec la possibilité d: Name of the command with the possibility of putting an icon instead (to delete it you must double-click on the icon in question)
index.md.Requête à envoyer à la caméra pour faire: Request to send to the camera to perform an action (switch to night mode, ptz, etc.).
index.md.Vous pouvez utiliser les tags \\#usernam: You can use the tags \ #username \ # and \ #password \ #, which will be automatically replaced by the username and password when using this command
index.md.Commande stop : pour les caméras PTZ, il: Stop command: for PTZ cameras, there is often a command that stops the movement, this is where it must be specified
index.md.Afficher : permet d'afficher la commande: Display: allows you to display the order or not on the dashboard
index.md.Configuration avancée (petites roues cra: Advanced configuration (small notched wheels): allows you to display the advanced configuration of the command (logging method, widget, etc.)
index.md.Tester : permet de tester la commande: Test: allows you to test the command
index.md.Supprimer (signe -) : permet de supprime: Delete (sign -): allows you to delete the command
index.md.On retrouve sur celui-ci l'image de la c: We find on this one the image of the camera, the commands defined in the configuration, the command to take a capture, the command to start taking multiple image captures and the command to browse these captures.
index.md.Sur le dashboard et le panel il est poss: On the dashboard and the panel it is possible to resize the widget to adapt it to your needs
index.md.Un clic sur l'image permet d'afficher ce: Clicking on the image displays it in a window and in a larger format.
index.md.Un clic sur la dernière commande pour pa: A click on the last command to browse the screenshots will display this one.
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toutes les captures o: You will find here all the catches organized by day then by date, you can for each of them
index.md.la voir en plus en grand en cliquant sur: see it bigger by clicking on the image
index.md.En mobile le widget est un peu différent: In mobile the widget is a little different: if you click on the image of the camera you get this larger with the possible commands.
index.md.Le plugin caméra met aussi à disposition: The camera plugin also provides a panel that allows you to see all your cameras at once, it is accessible by Home → Camera.
index.md.Pour l'avoir il faut l'activer sur la pa: To have it you have to activate it on the plugin configuration page
index.md.Il est bien sur aussi disponible en mobi: It is of course also available in mobile by Plugin → Camera
index.md.Cette commande un peu spécifique permet: This somewhat specific command allows the capture to send it (compatible with the slack, mail and transfer plugin).
index.md.La configuration est assez simple vous a: The configuration is quite simple, you call the send send action (called "Recording") in a scenario.
index.md.Dans la partie titre vous passez les opt: In the title part you pass the options.
index.md.Par défaut il suffit de mettre le nombre: By default, just put the number of captures you want in the "number of captures or options" field, but you can go further with options (see details below "advanced options of captures").
index.md.Dans la partie message, vous n'avez plus: In the message part, you just have to fill in the order of the plugin (currently slack, email or transfer) which sends the captures.
index.md.Vous pouvez en mettre plusieurs séparés: You can put several separated by &&.
index.md.nbSnap=3 delay=5 ==> envoi 3 captures fa: nbSnap = 3 delay = 5 ==> send 3 captures made at 5 second intervals (send triggered via the scenario) movie = 1 sendFirstSnap = 1 detectMove = 1 ==> send the first capture, then send a capture to each motion detection and record a video until the "Stop Recording" command to insert in the scenario.
The film will be stored on your Jeedom.
index.md.Si vous avez une caméra qui possède la d: If you have a camera that has motion detection and you want to transmit it to Jeedom this is the url to put on your camera
index.md.Il faut bien entendu avant avoir créé un: Obviously, before creating an info type command on your camera
index.md.Les enregistrements se trouvent par défa: The recordings are found by default in plugins / camera / data / records / * ID \ _CAM *, please note that this may vary if you asked Jeedom to record them elsewhere
index.md.En ssh ou dans administration -> OS\/DB: In ssh or in administration -> OS / DB -> System do: dpkg --configure -a
index.md.Quelles sont les conditions pour que ma: What are the conditions for my camera to be Jeedom compatible (if it is not in the compatibility list)?
index.md.La seule condition c'est que la caméra p: The only condition is that the camera has an url which sends back an image (well an image not a video stream)
